name: A Grave Error
effect:
May only be played by a stunned character.
React: After this character is targeted by a melee strike, before that strike resolves make a melee strike targeting the character performing the strike.
"To earn their name, the Medusan Lords slaughtered the true Medusans to the last." - Sorcha

name: Acrobatic Strike
effect:
Order: Make a Dexterity check (DC 16); if successful, this character may make a melee strike. If unsuccessful, stun this character.
"Misearis is the battleground between the Elves and NoThRoG." - Duchess Cassandra of Andover

name: Adoramus Te
effect:
Elf • Warlord • Unique • Scribe +6 • Half Elf
Adoramus Te is both a cleric and a wizard. Adoramus Te enters play as if he were level 5.
Order: Discard a card from your hand to give Adoramus Te +1 level until the end of the turn.

name: Alert
effect:
React: After this rogue is targeted by a ranged or melee strike, make a Perception check (DC 20). If successful, ready this rogue.
"…but perhaps more is at stake." - Duchess Cassandra of Andover

name: Ambushed Before the Battle
effect:
Spend Order: Name a faction and chose another player. The chosen player msut reveal his or her hand. Select one character of the named faction from the revealed cards to be shuffled back into that player's deck.
"We need to talk" - Maxt Stormcrow

name: Andelwick
effect:
Mercenary • Warlord • Monk • Unique
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand to perform an attack without spending. These strikes may only target stunned characters.

name: Aphotican
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Scribe +9
Aphotican may scribe any spells up to 5th level. Aphotian may play scribed spells regardless of class and level.

name: Arrow of Slaying
effect:
Order: Discard the Arrow of Slaying to make this character's ranged attacks inflict 2 additional wounds against a specific faction until the end of the turn. Roll a die: 1-3 Mercenaries, 4-6 Deverenians, 7-9 Dwarves, 10-12 Elves, 13-15 Free Kingdoms, 16-18 NoThRoGs, 19-20 any character.
"Leave a warning, Mithglyn." - Cear Adinerach

name: Assassin's Cup
effect:
Spend React: After a character has used an action on an item, target that character who must make a poison save (DC 15) or suffer 1 wound.
React: Once per turn, if this character is an Assassin, after a character has used an action on an item, target that character who must make a poison save (DC 15) or suffer one wound.

name: Avatar of Albrecht
effect:
Epic
Defend +10 • Power Attack +10
Riding +10
+2 skill. +1 hit point.
"Thy way is the way of faith and charity. Gird thy heart with these, and thy god shall grant thee favor." - Sir Selenoth

name: Avatar of Amoudosi
effect:
Mercenary • Avatar • Unique
Order: Once per turn, remove up to 2 wounds from the Avatar.
"I call upon Amoudosi to fight for Misearis and the Free Kingdoms!" Baqbou Umbala, Shattered Faith Part I

name: Avatar of Bone
effect:
Elf • Avatar • Unique
Avatar of Bone has an ATK bonus equal to the number of character cards in your discard pile.
Order: Kill one of your characters in this rank to remove all wounds from the Avatar.

name: Avatar of Djarat
effect:
Mercenary • Avatar • Unique
May equip any number of Weapon items.
From the ranks of the dead came a huge warrior with many arms, each carrying a great sword. He looked across the field at Amoudosi, but did not waver.
- Shaken Faith Part III

name: Avatar of Fineltour
effect:
Epic
Marksmanship +10 • Riposte +10
Stealth +10
+2 skill. +1 hit point.

name: Avatar of Kavara
effect:
Epic
Charisma +10 • Magic Resistance +10
Scribe +10
+2 skill. +1 hit point.

name: Avatar of Neus
effect:
Epic
Defend +10 • Medicine +10
Scribe +10
+2 skill. +1 hit point.
"Neus teaches that all pain is fleeting. Do your worst, NoThRoG. You cannot harm me." - Frederick Lahr

name: Avatar of Sanaa
effect:
Mercenary • Avatar • Unique
When a character successfully hits the Avatar with a melee strike, the character's player chooses and discards one card from his hand. Players with no cards ignore this effect.

name: Avatar of Spirit
effect:
Elf • Avatar • Unique
Order: Kill the Avatar to target up to three characters in an adjacent rank. Inflict one wound on each target.
"Djarat sides with the Elves? How can this be?" - Baqbou Umbala, Shaken Faith Part V

name: Avatar of Yscar
effect:
Mercenary • Seer • Monster • Avatar • Unique
When a Monster of 5th level or less is brought into play, Avatar of Yscar copies the ATK, AC, skill, and hit points of the Monster. The Avatar also gains all of the text and abilities in the Monster's text box while losing any other previous abilities. The Avatar retains this ability and all its printed traits.

name: Banner of Rallying
effect:
Unique
While the Banner is equipped by a character in your first rank, opposing characters must make a fear save (DC 13) after moving into their first rank. If the save is failed, move the character back one rank.

name: Barrier
effect:
Dwarf
React: After a character in another army moves into their first rank, if that character has a Steed equipped, discard that Steed to inflict 1 wound on the target.
"Ironhall's walls collapsed in minutes. How can we fight when the very earth is against us?"

name: Bascarite Necklace
effect:
Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to reveal the top five cards of your deck, one at a time. If you reveal a character, stop and bring that character into play if you may legally do so. You may move him or her forward up to two ranks.
Discard the other cards drawn.

name: Bascarite Swarm
effect:
Spend Order: Choose another player. Until the end of the turn, each time the selected player performs an action that results in drawing a card from his deck, that player must inflict two wounds on any character in his army.
"Without peasants to toil, Llyr and Andover may soon fall to famine." - Sir Robert

name: Bascaron's Children
effect: "Angu has numbers and power, but I have trust and control. Perhaps it is time to end the feud, at long last." - Yscar the Elder

name: Bascaron's Gaze
effect: Spend React: Play after the initiative roll. If you have the highest initiative roll, any wounds inflicted this turn may not be reduced or redirected. If you do not have the highest initiative roll, players may not draw any cards from their decks until next turn.

name: Bear
effect:
Unique • Totem
You must spend a Shaman or Uthanak to bring this card into play.
Order: Once per turn, move a character in your army of the same faction as your Warlord forward or backward one rank.

name: Belshsar the Scarred
effect:
Deverenian • Necromancer
Spend Order: Stun Belshsar to move him forward one rank and immediately play a spell without spending. The spell must be an Order or Spend Order.

name: Bershar Nin
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Unique
Slave Trader
Spend Order: Move all of your non-Nothrog characters forward one rank.
Order: Put a lower level character into play without a loyalty penalty.

name: Black Moss
effect: Order: Spend Black Moss to do 1 wound to this character and 1 wound to a character in an adjacent rank. If Black Moss kills this character, you may choose to equip Black Moss to one of your characters in the same rank.

name: Blood Hound
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items
React: After Blood Hound inflicts one or more wounds on another character, that character may not ready during the next Ready Phase.

name: Bracers of Weaponry
effect: Order: Discard the Bracers of Weaponry to search your deck for a Weapon item. This cleric equips it, ignoring class restrictions.

name: Brown Kratchling
effect:
Nothrog • Kratchling
React: After Brown Kratchling comes into play, search your deck for a Green Kratchling, show it to the other players and put it in your hand.
"Keep an eye on the young one, my pets." - Malrog

name: Byaal Kadapati
effect:
Dwarf • Warlord • Unique
All Gargoyles in play have the ability: "Spend Order: Target another Gargoyle who gains a bonus to its ATK and AC until the end of the turn equal to this character's ATK."
Spend Order: Put up to three Gargoyles into play from your hand following the normal rules for putting characters into play.

name: Caer's Kiss
effect:
Order: Target a card in any player's discard pile. Additional copies of that card may not be played until the end of the turn.
Order: Select another player and target a card at random from that player's hand. The target player must reveal the card and may not play any other copies of that card until the next turn.

name: Cear's Plan
effect: "Ten men die a certain way at a certain hour, and everyone knows it's a ritual. A hundred? A thousand? Who can see through the tears?" - Black Tom

name: Cear's Stone
effect:
Stealth +7
This character may remain spent during the Ready Phase.
Spend Order: Give all of your characters Stealth +5 while this character remains spent.

name: Chainmail of Loyalty
effect:
Armor • Good characters only.
React: After a character of the same faction as your Warlord in your army is killed, this character gains +1 AC until the end of the turn.
"Soren and Zeal warred upon each other… and then the earth fell in on Ironhall." - Word

name: Children of Yscar
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
If Children of Yscar is in your discard pile, you may spend a character in your army as an order to put the Children of Yscar into your hand.
"Unnatural mockeries of Amoudasi's pure, true flame." - Azamereth Flamekeeper

name: Clarrisa
effect:
Deverenian • Assassin • Stealth +7
Clarrisa's attacks are Stealth actions.
React: After Clarrisa kills another character with a melee strike, if she is in you first rank, she may make a Stealth check at +10 to enter the ranks of the killed character's army without Spending.

name: Cynophontis
effect:
Unique • Totem
You must spend a Shaman or Nassiral Hate to bring this card into play.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a character, show it to the other players and add it to your hand.
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on or remove a wound from, a character of the same faction as your Warlord.

name: Dame Martha
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Martha has +5 AC against ranged strikes.
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 ranged strikes.
"There's proof of the angel's claims, but our enemy has thus far eluded us, milady."

name: Dance of Death
effect:
Necromancers play this as a wizard spell.
Spend React: After all players "pass" at the end of the turn, you may remove one wound from each of your characters in your front rank. At the beginning of next turn, any of your characters with a wound may not ready.
"Come, come, Ichaerus. I'm sure we have much in common…" - Havellin Tansiq

name: Dead World Curses
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character with a Cursed item equipped. Stun, or inflict 1 wound on the target character.
Spend Order: Search your deck for an item card with the Cursed trait, show it to the other players and add it to your hand.

name: Death Fog
effect:
Mercenary
May not equip items. When Death Fog enters play, all players may put a character with the Monster or Undead trait into their hands from their discard piles.
Majeral grinned at his foes' moaning forms. Then he reached for his chains…

name: Destin the Sighted
effect:
Nothrog
Destin may equip and use "Eyestalk" cards as if he were three levels higher and a Reaver. After Destin uses an action on an "Eyestalk" card, the "Eyestalk" card is discarded.

name: Double Bladed Sword
effect:
Weapon • Shield
React: After this character successfully hits with a melee strike with a roll greater than 10, spend the Double Bladed Sword to make an additional melee strike at the same ATK bonus.

name: Drums of Panic
effect:
Bard only.
Order: Spend the Drums to target a character. Target character must make a fear save (DC 10) or be moved back one rank.
Spend Order: Target a character. Target character must make a fear save (DC 20) or be moved back one rank and then become spent, if ready.

name: Eyestalk of Will
effect:
Reaver only.
React: Spend the Eyestalk before a character up to 3 ranks away makes a save. The DC of the save is increased by twice the number of Eyestalks equipped to this character.

name: Face of Mirrors
effect:
Illusionists play this as a 3rd level spell.
Spend React: After an opposing character inflicts one or more wounds on a character in your army with a melee strike, redirect the wounds to a character adjacent to the opposing character.
"Be forwarned, any attack against me could be an attack against your brother." Zartoch smiled, and smiled, and smiled…

name: Fireworks
effect:
Order: Discard the Fireworks to target a character up to three ranks away. Target character and any characters adjacent to that character must make a fear save (DC 15) or become spent.
"No enemy can stand against Amoudosi's flame. The Elves are no exception." Baqbou Umbala, Shattered Faith Part II

name: Flame Steed
effect:
Steed
This character suffers 1 wound at the end of each turn, unless he or she has a Ring of Fire Resistance equipped.
Spend Order: Move forward or backward up to 3 ranks.
Order: Spend Flame Steed to perform a +5 melee strike.

name: Gallow's Fiend
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Spend Order: Target a spent or stunned adjacent character of 4th level or less. The target becomes ready, but may not perform an attack until next turn.
"Servitude is its own price." - Lady Bhaine

name: Geltran
effect:
Elf • Necromancer • House Dythanus
React: After Geltran is targeted with a melee strike, if he is spent, you may take one character card from your discard pile and add it to your hand. This ability may be performed while stunned.

name: Giant Strength Potion
effect: Order: Discard Giant Strength Potion to perform a +10 melee strike that inflicts an additional wound.

name: Glass Dagger
effect:
This character's melee strikes inflict no wounds.
React: After this character successfully hits with a melee strike, the target of the melee strike must make a melee strike against a character in a rank behind the target (you roll for the melee strike).

name: Gloves of Mercy
effect:
Gauntlet
This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits with a melee strike.
React: After this character inflicts wounds with a melee strike, reduce the wounds inflicted to 0 and stun the target.

name: Green Kratchling
effect:
Nothrog • Kratchling
If Green Kratchling is killed, shuffle it into your deck.
"Hordes of the little buggers crawl through the eastern passes, as if some unseen hand directs them." - Kothkah

name: Hawk Hatchet
effect:
Weapon
Order: If this character is a Ranger, discard the Hawk Hatchet to perform a +6 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

name: Healer
effect:
Dwarf • Human
Spend Order:Target and spend a character in your army to remove one wound from the target character.
"Chaim left the Seers in a fit of madness and despair, your eminence." The Hethrhod sighed. "I fear for him… and us."

name: Helm of Undying
effect:
AC: (+1)
Helm • Necromancer only.
Order: Once per turn, kill a ready character in your army to put a character of equal or lower level from your discard pile into your hand.
Spend Order: Kill a ready character in your army to put a character of equal or lower level from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Hendric the Mirage
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist
React: Once per turn, after another character performs an action, that character must make a magic save (DC 15). If the acting character fails the save you may spend a character adjacent to the acting character.
"Actually, Lord Kestrel, I may know a sage who could help us…"

name: Honor
effect:
Dwarf
React: After a character in your army suffers one or more wounds, Honor gains +1 ATK and +1 AC until the end of the turn.
After the battle and against orders, Honor returned to Ironhall's ruin. "You will be remembered, Pillar. You will be remembered, Boulder…"

name: Hurgg
effect:
Nothrog • Pit Fighter
Hurgg is +2 levels for using fighter action cards. Hurge gains +3 ATK and an additional strike at +2 (+5 total) if he is involved in a Pit Fight.
Impressive, for a grandstander." - Validan

name: I Call on Your Power!
effect:
Wizard and cleric only. This is a spell.
Order: Ready one of your lower level Elementals or Gargoyles in play. At the end of the turn, stun that Elemental or Gargoyle.

name: Iceslayne
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Powerattack +7
Loner crept past the sleeping beast. The glint of metal shone brightly in the icy lair. "My Lady," he whispered to himself, "I have found it."

name: Illusionary Defense
effect:
Illusionists play this as a 3rd level spell.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, any character making a melee strike against a character in this wizard's army must make a magic save (DC 10 + the targeted character's level) or their melee strike is cancelled.
"We fight shadows and fog. Someone wants us distracted…" - Purge

name: Illusionary Script
effect:
Illusionists play this without spending.
Spend Order: Reveal a character card in your hand. Search your deck for a copy of that card and add it to your hand.
"The histories tell of Signon slaying his Emperor. The histoies lie." - Master K'hallaek

name: Infernal Designs
effect:
Wizard or cleric only. This is a spell. A character may play only one Infernal Designs per turn.
React: After this character kills an opposing character with a strike or action, attach this card to this character. While it is attached this character has +1 Hit Point.

name: Invulnerability Potion
effect: Order: Discard Invulnerability Potion to give this character +2 AC and +4 hit points until the end of the turn.

name: Jodin Drac
effect:
Deverenian • Warlord • Unique
May equip two Weapons. If Drac is your Warlord, all of your other Deverenian fighters within one rank of Drac have +2 ATK and +1 AC.
"His uncle is Emperor. So close to the throne, and yet so far…" - Alhana Genecourt

name: Kaballite Tower
effect:
Mercenary • Seige
May not perform Actions.
Wizards adjacent to one or more Kaballite Towers gain the ability:"React: Once per turn, after this wizard spends to play a spell, ready the wizard."

name: Kasugoan
effect:
Mercenary • Avatar • Unique
Kasugoan's alignment is the same as your Warlord's alignment.
React: Once per turn, after a character in your army is killed with a melee strike, you may immediately attack with a character in your army.
"You can defy law, but not justice." - Kerebrus

name: Kerro
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Astral • Celestial
React: After Kerro enters play, target a character in your 1st rank who has not permanently gained a hit point. The target character permanently gains 1 hit point.
"There is a price to pay for freedom, Uriel. I pray you learn what Eiael did not."

name: Koratcghuk
effect:
Nothrog • Unique
Koratcghuk inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
While Koratcghuk is in play, all characters coming into play enter play as if they were one level higher.

name: Kun's Merciful Touch
effect:
Monk only.
React: After this Monk wounds another character with two melee strikes in the same attack, kill the wounded character.
React: After this Monk wounds a character with a melee strike, that strike inflicts an additional wound.

name: Leun Moonstone
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid
Leun has one hit point for each rank in your army that your army occupies.
"Some things simply should not be: the Blackthorn duck and his allies chief among them.

name: Limestone Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
You must have a cleric in play to bring Limestone Gargoyle into play.
Order: Once per turn, reveal the top five cards of your deck. If one of those cards is a Gargoyle of 5th level or less, replace Limestone Gargyle with that Gargoyle. Shuffle Limestone Gargoyle and all attached cards back into your deck.

name: Litany of the Dead
effect:
Order: Discard the Litany to name a non-Warlord charcter and target all copies of that character in play, in all player's hands, and in all player's decks. Until the end of the turn, copies of that character may not enter play or perform actions.
"It's not my soul you should worry about, false priest." - Death

name: Llyr Irregulars
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend React: When you have an illegal rank due to a character being killed, retrieve another Llyr Irregulars from your deck and put into play it in your first rank.

name: Lord Miracus
effect:
Deverenian
Order: Spend a Weapon equipped by Miracus to perform a melee strike.
"Blackthorn remembers Deverenia as it was and should be. He is not my lord, yet I serve him gladly."

name: Madrigal's Blindstrike
effect:
Order: Attach this card to to this character. While attached, this character gains the ability: "Spend React: After a character readies during the Orders Phase, inflict one wound on the character."
"If the enemy is willing to cut himself, let him."

name: Maelifcorum
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
You must spend a wizard to bring Maelifcorum into play.
Maelifcorum may equip up to three Weapons, up to three Shields, up to three Armors, and up to three Helms.

name: Magic Shield
effect:
Spend React: Play after another player's spell targets a card in your army. Cancel the spell and attach this card to this wizard. This wizard gains +3 AC while this card is attached.
"I know you, Ancient One. I remember you from times of old." - Anton Cyldragen

name: Mammoth
effect:
Unique • Totem
You must spend a Shaman or Sceth Hellbringer to bring this card into play.
Order: Once per turn, ready a spent (not stunned) character with the Seige trait.

name: Marius Dela
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Bard
Order: Discard a card from your hand to give target character one of the following until the end of the turn: Defend +3, Magic Resistance +3, Marksmanship +3, Medicine +3, Powerattack +3, Riding +3, Riposte +3, or Scribe +3.

name: Martyr
effect:
Dwarf • Defend +5
React: After Martyr is targeted with a melee strike, make a Defend check (DC 15 + the attacker's level). If successful, kill Martyr to inflict 1 wound on the attacker.
"For once, they suffered, that I may live. The debt will be repaid, but another day…

name: Merciless Ride
effect:
Spend Order: Ready all Steed cards in your army. At the end of the turn discard all of your spent Steed cards not equipped by characters with the Riding feat.
"Oh, what have you done to them?" - Revan

name: Mindfire Medallion
effect: React: After an opponent draws or removes a card from his deck during the Order Phase, spend the Medallion to force the player to reveal the cards drawn or removed. You may choose to have that player keep those cards, or discard them and draw that many cards from the top of that player's deck.

name: Misearean Slaver
effect:
Mercenary
Slaver may remain spent during the ready phase.
Spend Order: If this character is in the first rank, target a non-Warlord character of lower level in an opponent's first rank. The target character gains Stealth +5 and is under your control as long as this character remains spent and not stunned.

name: Mithglyn's Caprice
effect: React: Play before this character performs a ranged strike. Cancel the strike and choose a player, who must choose one of his or her characters as the target for a +10 ranged strike from this character which may not receive any bonuses.

name: Moropha
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Marksmanship +5 • Riding +5
Morophus' skill equals the number of Druids and Rangers in play.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
The arrow flew from nowhere, and bit deep into her side. She would be the only one to survive the Battle of the Wounded Lady.

name: Na'Chuk
effect:
Nothrog
You may choose to leave Na'Chuk spent during the Ready phase.
Spend Order: If Na'Chuk is in your front rank, target and spend a character of lower level in an oppoent's front rank. As long as Na'Chuk is in play and spent, the targeted character may not ready.

name: Nactaar
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Bascaron
May be targeted with melee strikes regardless of rank.
Spend Order: If Nactaar is in your last occupied rank, perform a melee strike targeting a character in another army's last occupied rank.

name: Narasis
effect:
Elf • Undead • Tansiq
React: If Narasis enters play from your discard pile, Narasis gains +5 ATK and +5 AC permanently.
"The legacy of Calix's betrayal lives on in our master."

name: Nelchat the Horror
effect:
Deverenian • Seer
Spend Order: If Nelchat is not in the first rank, all players shuffle their hands into their decks and then draw a number of cards from their decks equal to the number of cards shuffled into their decks. Move Nelchat forward 1 rank.

name: Nightslasher
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Nightslasher inflicts an additional wound whenever it hits with a melee strike.
Nightslasher may only attack a character in an army if all of the characters in that army's first rank are spent or stunned.

name: Ogre
effect:
Mercenary
React: After a character in your army is killed, move Ogre forward one rank.

name: Opposition Talisman
effect:
Spend Order: Target and stun a character of opposite alignment and lower level up to three ranks away.
"Worthless little dwarf," said Hate, fingering the talisman. "Wait here."

name: Parsis Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger • Assassin • Lycanthrope
Parsis is considered both a fighter and a rogue. Parsis enters play as if he were level 4.
React: After a Lycanthrope form is equipped by Parsis, instead of discarding any items equipped to Parsis, place those items on top of your deck.

name: Pit Fight
effect: Spend Order: Target a lower-level character up to three ranks away to perform an attack without spending with all melee strikes targeting that character. After the attack, if the target is still in play, he or she may perform an attack without spending with all melee strikes targeting this character.

name: Potion of Blurring
effect:
Order: Discard the Potion of Blurring. Until the end of the turn, all characters targeting this character with a melee strike or action, must make a Perception check (DC 22). If the check is failed, the action or strike is canceled.
"The important thing to remember, Kez, is that I was never here." - Kenia

name: Pull the Strings
effect:
Bards and wizards only. This is a spell.
Spend Order: Target a lower-level non-Warlord character who must make a magic save (DC 20). If that character fails the save, that character gains Stealth +15 and is under your control until the end of the turn.

name: Punch Drunk
effect:
Order: Target a stunned character. The target character performs a melee strike against an adjacent character of your choosing (you roll the strike for the stunned character).
"Now, Basil, there's a perfectly good explanation…" - Dustin St. Gulik

name: Queen of Lightning
effect:
Deverenian • Avatar • Unique
Spend Order: Stun the Queen to target any three characters in play, one at a time. In the order that they were targeted, the Queen performs a +7 ranged strike on each of these characters regardless of rank. The targeted characters add the rank they occupy to their AC for the duration of this strike.

name: Qultan the Student
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Illusionist
Spend React: After another of your characters has completely resolved the playing of a wizard spell, you may play that spell again with Qultan as the one playing the spell if Qultan could legally play the spell while unspent.

name: Rafkin
effect:
Elf • Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Ready an Elf or Free Kingdoms fighter of up to 4th level.
Spend Order: Target an Elf or Free Kingdoms fighter in your army. Give that fighter +3 ATK and +3 AC (+5 ATK and +5 AC for a Paladin) until the end of the turn.

name: Rally
effect:
Warlord only.
Spend Order: Draw five cards from your deck. You may immediately put any number of 1st-level character from your hand into play. Discard any remaining cards in your hand.

name: Raylor Magicbane
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Warlord • Bard • Unique • Magic Resistance +5
Raylor may play wizard spells up to 2nd level. If Raylor is your Warlord, your critical failures are considered critical successes and all of your other Free Kingdoms characters have +4 Skill.

name: Reaper's Shadowbox
effect:
Illusionist only.
Spend Order: Move any character of equal or lower level in your army to your first rank. That character is discarded at the end of the turn.
"'Tis a charm so lovely that it once enraptured Death himself. No mortal can resist its quaint allure." - Lord Kestrel

name: Revsheth
effect:
Elf • Undead
When Revsheth is in your discard pile you may spend a Necromancer of 3rd level or higher as an Order to put Revsheth into your hand.
"Remember the fallen. They'll remember you." - Cear Adinerach

name: Ring of Fire Resistance
effect: Order: Once per turn, until the end of the turn, this character may not be targeted by spells that create ranged strikes or require magic saves.

name: Ring of Spell Storing
effect:
Spend Order: Reveal from your hand and attach to this item a wizard spell of 5th level or less. You may discard the attached spell at any time to play it as if it were in your hand.
"Sometimes Anton forgets to study." - Oeqn Haadh

name: Ring of Spell Turning
effect: Spend React: After this character is targeted by a spell from another army, spend the Ring to get any one spell from your deck and add it to your hand, then discard one card from your hand.

name: Ring of the Skylords
effect: React: After this character suffers one or more wounds, shuffle him or her back into your deck. Discard all cards equipped by and attached to the character.

name: Sakarian Bloodknight
effect:
Mercenary
Sakarian Bloodknight is considered to be of the same faction(s) as your Warlord as well as being a Mercenary.
"The money's not important. You let them kill, and they're yours for life." - Lady Bhaine

name: Sakarian Manticore
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
Sakarian Manticore does not spend when using Spend Order Action cards.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand to perform a +0 ranged strike.

name: Scarab
effect:
Unique • Totem
You must spend a Shaman or Taoth to bring this card into play.
Ranged strikes performed by this character receive +4 to the die roll. Saves against action cards played by this character have a +3 DC.

name: Selah Cohler
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Illusionist
Magic Resistance +0
Spend React: After a spell targets a card in Selah's army, make a Magic Resistance check (DC 15 + character's level). If successful, you may redirect the spell at a legal target in another army.

name: Shadowfiend
effect:
Mercenary • Monster •May not equip items.
React: After Shadowfiend kills a character, attach the top card of your deck face down under Shadowfiend.
React: After Shadowfiend suffers one or more wounds, discard a facedown card attached to Shadowfiend to reduce the wounds suffered to zero.

name: Shame
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
React: After Shame is put into play you may search your deck for a level 1 Dwarf character and put it into play.
"There is no excuse, my king. I was not strong enough, and Ironhall died for it."

name: Shattering Blow
effect:
Fighter and Monk only.
React: Play before this character makes a melee strike roll. All AC bonuses from items are ignored for this strike, and this character inflicts an extra wound if the strike is successful.
"That's what you get for buying Misearean, knight." - Raagnar

name: Skeleton
effect:
Elf • Undead
May not start in play. Your initiative rolls have a -1 penalty. You may have any number of Skeletons in your deck. You must have an unspent Necromancer in play to bring Skeleton into play.
Led by Djarat, Saunginel's troops faced the fire of Amoudosi. - Shattered Faith Part IV

name: Skeltis
effect:
Familiar • Brownie
Spend Order: Look at an opponent's hand.
Spend Order: Discard Skeltis and name a card. Target a player who must retrieve all copies of that card from his or her deck and discard them.

name: Song of Triumph
effect:
Bard only.
Spend React: play after a character in your army kills a character in another army. All other characters in your army gain a +7 ATK bonus until the end of the turn.
"Keep it up, Uther, and there'll have to be an intermission." - Fauve Mightyheart

name: Soul Gem Kashira
effect:
Soul Gem • Unique
All your characters in your army have Magic Resistance +0.
If you have three other Soul Gems in play as well, all characters in your army have an additional +2 to their Magic Resistance (+2 total) and this card's ATK and AC bonuses are doubled.

name: Soul Gem Medera
effect:
Soul Gem • Unique
All characters in your army have +1 ATK.
If you have three other Soul Gems in play as well, all characters in your army have an additional +1 ATK (+2 total) and this card's ATK and AC bonuses are doubled.

name: Soul Gem Tenira
effect:
Soul Gem • Unique
All your characters in your army have +2 skill.
If you have three other Soul Gems in play as well, all characters in your army have an additional +2 skill (+4 total) and this card's ATK and AC bonuses are doubled.

name: Soul Gem Yelara
effect:
Soul Gem • Unique
All characters in your army have +1 AC. If you have three other Soul Gems in play as well, all characters in your army have an additional +1 AC (+2 total) and this card's ATK and AC bonuses are doubled.

name: Stone of Fortune
effect:
React: Spend the Stone after this character has made a roll to reroll the die.
"Never seems to work for me." - Zagreb Umbala

name: Sudden Gale
effect:
Druids play this without spending.
Spend Order: Target one character per rank in an opponent's 1st, 2nd and 3rd rank. The 1st rank target, then the 2nd, then the 3rd must each make a magic save (DC 16). Targets failing the save are immediately moved back one rank.

name: Tenacious
effect:
Dwarf • Druid • Stone Druid
When Tenacious is ready in your first rank, characters in your second rank may make melee strikes as if they were in the first rank.
"His magic is foul, strange… and wondrous." - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Terratorn
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.
"With Ygraine's constant sieges, they're the only things profiting from Condor Pass." - Lord Halbrook

name: Terror of Blackthorne
effect:
Deverenian • Unique • Reaver
May only equip items with "Eyestalk" in the title. After the Terror suffers a wound it must discard a random item with "Eyestalk" in the title.
Spend Order: Search your deck for a card with "Eyestalk" in the title and add it to yout hand.

name: The Horror of Merrick
effect:
Nothrog • Reaver
May only equip items with "Eyestalk" in the title. After the Horror suffers a wound, it must discard a random item with "Eyestalk" in the title.
Spend Order: Target a card with "Eyestalk" in the title in your army and add that card to your hand.

name: The Plane of Secrets
effect: Order: Place this card as a character in your 5th rank, where it becomes a level 1 classless character with +0 ATK, 7 AC, +0 skill 1 hit point and the following ability: "Order: Discard this card and bring a character of 5th level or lower into play in this rank."

name: The Shattered Lands
effect:
Spend Order: Target a Monster in your army. That Monster may immediately make a melee strike against any stunned character in an opponent's army, regardless of rank.
"The Pit needs no protection. Anyone who would live to see it is one of us already." - Malrog

name: The Temple of Lore
effect:
Mercenary • Seige • Ethereal • Unique
May not start in play, or perform Actions. While the Temple of Lore is in play, your characters come into play one rank further back than normal, and characters in your army have a bonus to ATK, AC and skill equal to their level, and characters over 4th level have +1 hit point.

name: Throwing Daggers
effect:
Fighter and Monk only.
Spend Order: Perform five consecutive +0 ranged strikes. These strikes may not receive any bonuses to the die roll.
"To our esteemed cousin, the Lord Hate: we have reason to believe one of the prisoners has something we need…" - Cassica Moonseed

name: Tobrinsk
effect:
Nothrog • Monk • Half-Nothrog
Order: Once per turn, choose another player and name any card type. That player must reveal the top card of his or her deck. If that card is the named card type, it is discarded. If not, the player may add that card to his hand.
"My name is Tobrinsk. Have you heard of me?"

name: Tough it Out
effect:
React: After this fighter is targeted with a melee or ranged strike, inflict one wound on him or her to cancel the strike.
"We've borne the Abyssals' onslaught for centuries, but we no longer have the strength. We must go to the surface, father - it is the only way." - Prince Alaric

name: Treewalk
effect:
Druids play this as a 2nd level spell.
Spend Order: Target two characters in your army. The targeted characters switch places.
"How did you do that?" asked Halbrook, as the reinforcements marched out of the trees. Atu Amani simply smiled.

name: Unakhan
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip Weapons.
React: After Unakhan hits with a melee strike, make a skill check (DC 15). If successful, his next melee strike is a critical success. This effect is lost at the end of the turn.

name: Urukhu
effect:
Nothrog • Scout • Uthanak's Legion
May not start the game in play.
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
Spend React: After you win initiative, perform a +1 ranged strike.

name: Veleshan
effect:
Elf • Unique
Spend React: After Veleshan enters play, make a skill check (DC 11). If successful, he may target one character in your opponent's first rank who suffers one wound.
The Elements hunger. Appease them, and live forever.

name: Viper
effect:
Unique • Totem
You must spend a Shaman or Sav'rukk to bring this card into play.
All characters in your army of the same faction as your Warlord have the ability: "Spend React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, move this character forward or backward one rank to cancel it."

name: Viper's Strike
effect:
Shamans play this as a 2nd level spell
React: After a character has entered play, that character may immediately attack or perform an action that generates a ranged strike.

name: Votaurr Charm
effect: Spend Order: If this character is in your army's last occupied rank, he or she may perform a melee strike targeting a character in another army's last occupied rank. Until the end of the turn, all opposing characters may target this character with melee strikes regardless of rank.

name: Wand of Negation
effect: Order: Spend the Wand to target any item in an opponent's army. Until the end of the turn, all of the target item's bonuses are reduced to 0 and the item's text box is considered blank. The item retains all of its traits for purposes of equipping other cards (such as Helm, Weapon, Unique, etc.).

name: War
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
Spend React: After a character in this rank is killed, War may immediately perform a melee strike.
"I've faced Abyssals without flinching, but I knew fear when the earth itself turned against Ironhall."

name: Wheel of Death
effect:
Necromancers play this without spending.
Spend Order: Discard up to three cards from the top of your deck. Until the end of the turn, all characters in your 1st rank gain +2 ATK and +2 AC for each card discarded in this manner.

name: Whip of Despair
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: Once per turn, if this character is in the second rank, ready all characters in the first rank who are 1st or 2nd level and not stunned.

name: White Sash
effect:
Paladin and cleric only.
Order: Once per turn, if this character's alignment is currently good, until the end of the turn this character's alignment is evil.
Order: Once per turn, if this character's alignment is currently evil, until the end of the turn this character's alignment is good.

name: Wild Shape Bear
effect:
Wild Shape • Druid only.
Spend Order: Attach this card to this character, if this character does not already have a Wild Shape attached. While it is attached, this character gains the following ability, "Order: Once per turn, gain one hit point until the end of the turn. At the end of the turn, remove one wound from this character."

name: Wizard's Guard
effect:
Deverenian
If Wizard's Guard is in a rank with one or more wizards, he gains +3 ATK and +3 AC.
React: After one of your wizards kills Wizard's Guard with a card effect, shuffle Wizard's Guard back into your deck.

name: Words of Woe
effect:
Shaman, Bard, Druid, Necromancer or Illusionist only. This is a spell.
Spend Order: Target a character in play, who receives a -10 penalty to all rolls until the end of the turn.
"Come, lover, your task is almost finished." - Cassica Moonseed

name: Zombie
effect:
Elf • Undead
May not start in play. You may have any number of Zombies in your deck. You must have an unspent Necromancer in play to bring Zombie into play. All characters have the ability: "Order: Spend a Weapon attached to this character to kill a Zombie in an adjacent rank."
